text:
November 10
• Attended engineering review call.
• Quick sync with Amjith.
• Huddle with Khavin regarding PW tests.
• Fixed conflicts and addressed comments from copilot on PR#13603.
• Fixed conflicts across 25 files, addressed copilot comments and then tested it, PR#13674.
◦ Some debugging while resolving above
▪︎ Why SPO2 records from vitals ncg questionnaire does not show up in vitals table and plots because of different Lonic code and plotconfig in FE.
▪︎ questionnaire version coming as number instead of string. There is a BE fix for it already.
• Discussion with Bodhi regarding [1].
• Glancing over some PR's and noticed an issue with pr-automation workflow and pinged Areeb.
• Replied in some threads on slack.
Next
• Mark PR#14108 ready for review.
• Follow with Nihal regarding testing of PR#13603 and PR#13674

November 11
• Marked PR#14108 ready for review after looking at copilot comments.
• Quick discussion with Siddhanth regarding query he had -- AI features in care.
• Reviewed couple of PR's and glanced over some.
• Playing with playwright mcp with GitHub copilot - meh
• Started writing specs for Service Requests.
• Not part of work -> discussion with Shivank regarding deploying pupilfirst LMS for one of his friend.
• Attended Tuesday weekly call.
Next
• Write specs
• DPG review call.

November 12
• Reviewed some PR's, Filed issues/14304 for new OSS contributor.
• Filed issues/14314, for issue noticed during review of pull/14250 and assigned it to copilot.
• Made changes on PR#14301, [1]
◦ helper function to pick from ResourceCategoryDefinitionPikcer.
◦ setup to store encounter id and patient id so that it can be reused across all the encounter related tests.
◦ reusable selector to automatically pick from tab or menuitem.
◦ helper for creating service requests.
◦ Updated the CreateServiceRequest spec
• DPG review call.
• Some discussions with different team members and follow ups.
Next
• Write specs
• Review PR's
